alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 1:54AM CDT until March 25 at 8:38PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Oliver Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Marengo, Hale and Tuscaloosa Counties. .Flooding continues on the Black Warrior River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by this afternoon, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River At Oliver Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From early this morning to Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 132.0 feet, Flooding of rural roads southwest of Tuscaloosa occurs. At 135.0 feet, Numerous camphouses and some permanent residences southwest of Tuscaloosa become cutoff. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 124.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 135.0 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage Friday morning. - Flood stage is 129.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
